alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 3:16AM CST until February 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Iowa, Osceola, Dickinson, Sioux and O`Brien Counties. In Minnesota, Jackson County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Patchy and localized blowing snow is possible in locations that receive snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Quickly falling temperatures could result in flash freeze conditions on area roads and sidewalks.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
